name: testfullsystem
description: 测试猿全栈知识体系,软件测试知识体系构建

scripts.docs:update: pnpm add @vuepress/client@next @vuepress/plugin-docsearch@next @vuepress/plugin-register-components@next @vuepress/plugin-search@next @vuepress/utils@next vue vuepress@next vuepress-theme-hope@next vuepress-plugin-comment2@next vuepress-plugin-copy-code2@next vuepress-plugin-copyright2@next && pnpm i && pnpm up
